post.description: Create a New or Update an Existing Customer.

put.description: Activate a Customer (change status to 1). This is a convenience function to reactivate an inactivated Customer; it only changes the status. (Customers start in an active state when created.)
Inactivate a Customer (change status to 0). This is a convenience function that only changes the status.

delete.description: Delete a Customer. This is permanent; deleted Customers disappear from most views, and cannot be reactivated.
